questions.question_text: What is the purpose of an operating aquastat?

options.A: Senses the operation of a circulating pump = Flow Switch
options.B: A water temperature sensing device that will shut off the burner(s) if the temperature exceeds the desired operating range of the boiler or water heater = High temperature aquastat
options.C: Shuts off the burner(s) in the event that the pressure in a boiler exceeds its desired operating range = High limit pressure switch
options.D: Turns a steam boiler on and off to maintain a desired steam pressure = Operating pressure switch
